short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick way to get delivery quotes and arrange deliveries!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick way to get delivery quotes and arrange deliveries!

▻ Why get the Van's The Word extension:
With this Chrome extension, there is no need to leave your browser or open another tab to request a delivery quote and make a booking to ship a household item.

▻ Getting a delivery quote:
Once installed, make sure to pin the extension to your browser for easy reach. Then, simply click on the Van's The Word icon at the top of your browser. You will only need to enter your delivery details the first time in the form that pops up. You won't have to enter these details again unless you wish to change them. The details you last entered will be there whenever you click on the Van's The Word icon. 

If the item you want to ship is at an online marketplace, then you once you are on the item listing, click the 'Add Item' button to add the web address for the item. Adding the item's web page address will help us allocate a delivery partner for booking quicker. If there is no web page address added to your booking, we may need to contact you first, before we allocate a delivery partner and confirm your booking.

Once all the necessary details have been entered, click the 'Request Quote' button and your your quote should appear instantly on your personalised 'Quotes' page! 

You can then make a booking by clicking on 'Book Now'. This will take you to a payments page, where you must enter the payment amount which you have been quoted.

▻ What Items Can Be Shipped Using This Service?
We can only collect and deliver items that are in the below list. If your items does not fit the below description, we will be unable to collect. If you have any queries, you can contact us.

Items we are able deliver:
Beds
Mattresses
Chest of drawers
Wardrobes
Tables
Desks
Chairs
Sideboards
Credenzas
Coffee Tables
Sofas
Arm chairs
Shelves

▻ Getting a delivery quote for a collection of items (more than one item):
Currently, you can only request a separate quotes for each item. You may make a separate booking for different items and get in touch with us if you need them all to be collected and delivered at the same time. 

▻ How to remove an item web address from the form:
A web address can be deleted by navigating to the main tab (the home tab), clicking on the clicking the cross in the top right-hand corner of the box containing the web address you want to delete. 

▻ Quotes tab:
Once you have requested at least one delivery quote, you will find all your quotes saved in the quotes tab. From the quotes tab, you can can edit, delete and book a delivery. 

▻ Confirmed Bookings:
Once we've received your payment, we will confirm your booking by email and provide additional details for the delivery. 

▻ Your information:
The Van's The Word extension does not collect any information other than what you submit in the form. As stated earlier, we receive the information which you fill out in the pop-up form along with the web addresses for the items you add on. 

When you add a web address for the item you are currently looking at, the Chrome extension looks at your current open tab and fetches the URL of that tab. It then adds this URL to your form. 

So that you don't have to repeatedly enter your delivery details, the information you have already entered gets stored in your device's local storage. This is where the extension stores the data to ensure that this feature works as intended. We do not receive any of your information until you press the button to request a quote.
